1. What is the Big O notation of the algorithm that performs a linear search in an unsorted array of size n? 

Answer: O(n)

2. What is the Big O notation of the algorithm that performs a binary search in a sorted array of size n? 

Answer: O(log n)

3. What is the Big O notation of the algorithm that performs a bubble sort on an array of size n? 

Answer: O(n^2)

4. What is the Big O notation of the algorithm that performs a quicksort on an array of size n? 

Answer: O(n log n)

5. What is the Big O notation of the algorithm that performs a linear search in a sorted array of size n? 

Answer: O(n)
